articles.author: Zach Osterman
articles.title: Indiana believed to be paying record buyout to hire Darian DeVries as new basketball coach - IndyStar
articles.description: It's believed that Indiana will pay a record to hire a new head coach by bringing in Darian DeVries from West Virginia. Here are the figures.
articles.content:
• Darian DeVries will coach his third school in as many years when he walks the Assembly Hall sidelines next season.
  • Here's how much it cost the Hoosiers to bring him to Bloomington.
